channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2988] Similar products on detail page: Limit to 100
item.description:
On the product detail page, there is currently no limit to the number of similar products that are loaded. Some products have 900, this affects both performance and usability.

Please limit the number of similar products that are loaded to 100.
item.summary: Similar products on detail page: Limit to 100

comments.comment: Fixed for AT release.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2981] Category teaser: use portrait_small instead of portrait_medium
item.description:
Category teaser: use portrait_small instead of portrait_medium

e.g. here: http://test.distrelec.at/de/Automation/c/cat-L1D_379516
item.summary: Category teaser: use portrait_small instead of portrait_medium

comments.comment:
Pascal, are the small versions for the category thumbs available or do we have to use the existing medium sizes?

I tried to change an image url on test.distrelec.at from .../portrai_medium/... to .../portrai_small/... and the image was not found...

If we do not have small sizes here, you can close the issue. If we have them, assign it back to me, thanks!
Dominic: I've changed the format from medium to small and checked into branch v1.0.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2979] Similar products list EOL articles
item.description:
Product detail page:
in the similar products list, EOL products are currently not filtered. On some articles, there are several dozens of them.

e.g. here: http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Intel-Desktop-Board-DX79TO---Extreme-Series---Motherboard---ATX---LGA2011-Socket---X79-Intel-BOXDX79TO/p/11025895

Similar products are loaded from hybris. They should be filtered by product status to avoid EOL (status 60) and phase out (status 43), as per https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+DistSalesStatus
item.summary: Similar products list EOL articles

comments.comment:
Florian,
please assess the priority of this ticket for CH or ELFA.
Decision Florian: for CH Release
Fixed for AT release.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-1381] Facet Bar: Add dropdown for selection of additional B and C attributes
item.description:
The facet bar (https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/C13-Facets) in the search result list and the category navigation will currently only show facets of 'A' Attributes. 'B' and 'C' attributes are not accessible.

This change comprises the addition of the following functionality to the facets bar:

  • Addition of a dropdown menu below the last facet, containing all 'B' and 'C' attributes of all the products in the list
  • If the user selects such an attribute from the dropdown, it is placed as a facet right above the dropdown, below the previously last facet.
  • The user can then use this facet like any other of the 'A' facets.
  • The number of 'B' and 'C' facets that the user can select and add is not limited.
  • There is no functionality for the user to manually remove a selected facet.
  • If he sets up the filter so that no products in the result list include the previously selected facet anymore, the facet should be removed.
  • TBD whether the addition of a facet happens via AJAX or page reload.

This ticket is for tracking of

  • estimation
  • approval of change
  • update of CR
  • implementation
item.summary: Facet Bar: Add dropdown for selection of additional B and C attributes

comments.comment:
Hi Pascal,

can you please make an estimation of the additional functionalities. And also analyze the impact to other components.

BE implementation details
* FactFinder will deliver just the name (without any facet values) for 'B' and 'C' facets in default search responses.
* If the user selects such a 'B' or 'C' facet from the dropdown an additional FactFinder request has to be sent with a special parameter which contains the name of the selected facet.
* The result of this request additionally contains the selected facet with its values.

Estimation
* BE: 2 PD
* FE: 1 PD
waiting for confirmation to start implementation.

Hi Cornel,

this task was considered as high priority. This must be included in the next test cycle at KW49. That means it should be implemented by next thursday 28.11.
Additional facets will be added via AJAX call.

A few known limitations exists at the moment. Solving this limitations depends on information, which are needed from Raphael Husi. We assume to get this information today (27.11) to solve the limitations for the next release v0.5.2 for tomorrow (28.11).

Frontend is basically done.

open questions:

- What should happen if an fact finder error happens and no valid facet comes back in Ajax call? (Nothing, Lightbox ?)
- Should the newly added Facet be expanded or closed?

Known Limitation:

- For now, only the two facet types checkbox and boolean_checkobox are supported. If there is any need, that the range slider needs to be supported, assign back to me.
- Some Facets are not coming correctly from fact finder and are not working. (Possibly some problems with special chars?) Contact Cornel for more Informations

answers:
- ajax error -> lightbox
- should be expanded
Frontend is adjusted to show the error lightbox on an ajax error and to add the new facet already opened.

Entschuldigen Sie die Umstände.
Der normale Betrieb wird in Kürze wiederhergestellt.
Versuchen Sie es bitte später noch einmal!

Falls Sie Fragen oder Bestellungen haben, können uns von Mo - Do: 07:30 - 17:30; Fr: 07:30 - 16:00

unter <b>+43 1 334 10 10 99</b> oder per e-mail unter info-at@distrelec.com
 
Please let me know if you have any further questions.
Regards,
Oana

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2967] Only share via e-mail available in cart
item.description:
OS: Windows 7 Professional
Browser: IE 11.0.9600.16476 / Update Versions: 11.0.2
TS-27.9

Put some articles into the cart, go to cart, click on the share icon, only share via e-mail will appear. On other pages the share function is appearing correctly. (img_358-360_pzu)
item.summary: Only share via e-mail available in cart

comments.comment:
This is actually by design: It was an error that the other sharing options were available in the cart as well; we removed them last week.
Twitter and G+ should be available on the other pages, but not in the cart.
See DISTRELEC-2781

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2964] Product-images not displayed @Cart-Flyout
item.description: Product-images are not displayed at the cart-flyout. Only the placeholder-images are not displayed. See attached screenshot.
item.summary: Product-images not displayed @Cart-Flyout

comments.comment:
It only applies to the following case:
- open cart with articles in it. the images in the menu will show
- add an article through direct order, or remove an article. images showing
- click "recalculate" -> *images in menu are now gone*
- refresh the pages -> images are back

Muss vom Backend gelöst werden.

http://distrelec-ch.local:9001/cart/recalculate

Das Feld "thumbUrl" enthält nach recalculate die URL zum Missing Thumb Dummy Bild, anstatt die URL zum Bild.

-> Bild URL müsste analog /cart/update abgefüllt werden

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2958] Budget limitation: Change of budget per order resets yearly budget
item.description:
• Admin sets limits for budget per order (e.g. 500 EUR) and yearly budget (e.g. 10.000 EUR)
  • User places an order (e.g. for 1.888,20 EUR)
  • User's yearly budget is being reduced, residual budget is now 8.111,80 EUR (see screenshot 1)
  • Admin goes to "User Management" (see screenshot 2), changes budget per order to 1.000 EUR, clicks on "save changes"
  • Residual yearly budget is being overwritten with original value in field "Yearly budget" (10.000 EUR) (see screenshot 3)
item.summary: Budget limitation: Change of budget per order resets yearly budget

comments.comment:
The residual budget should be updated according to the change of the yearly budget.

In the above change, this would mean:

In the above case, before the change:
Yearly Budget: 10'000
Purchase made: 1'888.20
REsidual Budget: 8'111.80

After the change of the yearly budget to 1'000:
Yearly Budget: 1'000
Purchase made: 1'888.20
==> Residual Budget: -888.20 <==

@Nando: That's not correct anymore. The yearly budget gets reset if a user changes the yearly budget. But your right if the user just changes the order budget, this should not have an effect on the yearly budget. That's a bug and gets fixed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2957] Select price range in facet doesn't work
item.description:
OS: Windows 7 Professional
Browser: IE 11.0.9600.16476 / Update Versions: 11.0.2
TS-2.16

On home page, mega flyout, mouseover on components, click on a category level 3 (e.g analogue circuits). In field price of the facets select a price range, as result all articles are still displayed. (img_35_pzu)
item.summary: Select price range in facet doesn't work

comments.comment:
Indeed setting a price filter seems to have no effect. Applies to category navigation as well as search result page.
This seems to be a regression in the current release, last week it worked if I remember correctly.

I have changed the label in FF from "Price" to "Preis" for the German channels.
No the issue is, that the filters in the shop make no difference between label and field name.
So the filter that is set now is filter_Preis instead of filter_Price.
Cornel will check that how we can separate them.
Until it is fixed, I'll change the label back to "Price" so that the filtering is working again.
The label of the price facet group was used by the FE to create the price filter. This has been fixed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2956] Budget Limitation: Limitation-conform orders do not reduce overall budget
item.description:
• User has yearly budget limitation (e.g. 10.000 EUR) and single order limitation (e.g. 2.000 EUR)
  • User places order which does not have to be approved by admin (because its below the order limitation of 2.000 EUR)
  • ERROR: This order does not reduce his yearly budget limitation
  • Orders that have to be approved by admin work ok, i.e. the yearly budget is being reduced by the order total of said order.
item.summary: Budget Limitation: Limitation-conform orders do not reduce overall budget

302 problem -> problem occurs on all pages when logged in. spring security?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2948] Facet bar: Very long word/expression overlaps label
item.description:
Category: Koaxialkabel/Audiokabel/Flachkabel/Netzkabel (http://test.distrelec.at/de/Komponenten/Kabel-%26-Installationsmaterialen/Koaxialkabel-Audiokabel-Flachkabel-Netzkabel/c/cat-L3D_525384)

When opening the page, the category label in the facet bar contains an expressio, which is too long for the label, so it overlaps the label boundaries (see screenshot).

Please abbreviate such expressions using "…"
item.summary: Facet bar: Very long word/expression overlaps label

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2940] customer punch out filter ---> 404 Seite nicht gefunden
item.description: Punch out Filter on Customer8 with product 001441 ----> 404 Seite nicht gefunden
item.summary: customer punch out filter ---> 404 Seite nicht gefunden

comments.comment: Will investigate actual business requirement

Discussed with Florian:

- If a product is not available due to a country punchout filter, it is not exported to the fact finder index of that country. If the user tries to access it directly in that country, a 404 should be returned.
- HOWEVR, if a product is prohibited for a customer or a customer group due to a punchout filter, the product should still be found, only 'add to cart' should be prevented with the warning lightbox. As it used to be before the change of DISTRELEC-2716 was implemented.

Please revert this part of the change.
Will be live with the next deployment, curently scheduled for Friday 31.1.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2938] Registration Confirmation Mail: Button not showing correctly
item.description:
If I register a new account, a mail for the e-mail address confirmation was sent.
I received the mail with Outlook and there are some layout issues...
See printscreen!
item.summary: Registration Confirmation Mail: Button not showing correctly

comments.comment:
In the content area, the button "jetzt bestätigen" is distorted.

All other issues of the printscreen handled in linked tickets.
Hi Lukas, Please can you check for this email and also all the others. Thank you.
Bitte für 1.0_AT fixen

Hallo Beat,
Das html scheint grundsätzlich in Ordnung zu sein und wird auch nicht vom Outlook manipuliert (wie es z.b. der gmail Webclient macht). Möglicherweise lässt sich das Problem beheben, in dem das inline css für den Button auf das td Element geschrieben wird, das den Link umgibt.

1) I cannot test outlook

2) outlook has the worst styling support of all email clients

3) there is no way to style the link for outlook without affecting the styling in all other email clients

4) I only have 2 suggestions that might improve the link styling in outlook, Lukas please test:

a) add to table inline style: mso-table-lspace:0; mso-table-rspace:0;

or b) remove the table around the link button (affecting all email clients).

suggestions above had no effect, however, i found another solution that seems to work for outlook and gmail webclient:

add "nowrap" to the <td> and move the background-color from the <a> element to the <td>

<td style="border-collapse: collapse; background-color: #de1417;" nowrap>
<a style="display: inline-block; padding: 11px 10px; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle; text-decoration: none; border: 1px solid #de1417; color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;" href="${ctx.orderUrl}" target="_blank">${ctx.messages.buttonText}</a>
</td>

Do you have any concerns about this solution?
if it works, please use it.

item.summary: PIM import crashes

comments.comment: @Cornel: It has happen again. So I thought to open this ticket to analyse it in more deep.

Unfortunately we were not able to reproduce this error on a development environment. However, we identified a code sequence were a local session is created but not removed anyomore. This issue was fixed.

Please reopen the ticket if the error occurs again.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2924] Layout modification on detail page
item.description:
Please modify the gap of the technical attribute values on the detail page.

Today:
Width of attribute titles = 75%
Width of attribute values = 25%

Modify to:
Width of attribute titles = 50%
Width of attribute values = 50%

To Dos
Estimation
Implementation
item.summary: Layout modification on detail page

comments.comment: Needs to be decided in which Version this change should be considered (ELFA or CH/IT)
Bitte für 1.0_AT fixen
fixed, can be tested after deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2920] IE8: Image + Text Component: Images are distorted
item.description:
Images in the "linked image text component" are distorted, but only in IE 8 (in comparison to Firefox 26 and Chrome 32, see screenshot).

Test Page: http://test.distrelec.at/de/Arduino/cms/Arduino

https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/C42c-LinkedImage
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/C42d-LinkedImage-TextWYSIWYG
item.summary: IE8: Image + Text Component: Images are distorted

comments.comment:
Decicion needed. Two Options:

a) In IE8 we show the Text below the Image. This ist a fast solution, but maybe not the nicest. The advantage is, that everything remains as it is in all other browsers.

- not much to change
- long text remains in its column
- independet of defined image sizes, the padding between image and text is always 20px

b) We refactor the implemention so that it looks the same in every browser.

- many changes
- long text will float the image instead of stay in its column
- dependent on defined image sizes, if an image is smaller than one of the defined sizes there is more padding (white space) between image and text (see Screenshot)
Nando, please see my last comment. May be we can discuss this in order to find the best solution.
For R1.0_AT: go with approach a)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2919] TS 5.7 No topics are set as true in Optivo after clicking in confirmation email
item.description: After filling out the form and choosing your topics, this doesnt take effect in Optivo - the topics are all "false" in optivo.
item.summary: TS 5.7 No topics are set as true in Optivo after clicking in confirmation email

comments.comment: please provide more information: at least which site and which email address
so if you mean subscription for email distrelec.testing+7-newsletter@gmail.com this is a registered user and the segmentation flag is set to true.
Ok. All the categories (Automation, Power Lights etc) are set false even though they were ticked in the registration.

Discussed:
please change so that all topics are set to true when the user subscribes to the newsletter in my account or during shop registration or during checkout.
If the user was already signed up for the newsletter for only a selection of topics, keep the same selection.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2910] RMA confirmation mail: Add fields
item.description:
Please add the following product information to the RMA confirmation mail:

  • Product Name
  • Item number

Additionally, make labels language dependent.
item.summary: RMA confirmation mail: Add fields

comments.comment: Florian, is this required for AT?
Yes it is required for AT because of the RMA process.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2908] OCI Issue: Page Settings
item.description: We should not show the page settings bar for OCI customers.
item.summary: OCI Issue: Page Settings

comments.comment:
Discussed with Florian:

- the problem should be tackled at it's source:
- in the language settings lightbox, disable the following dropdowns for OCI customers (read-only)
-- Country
-- Currency
-- Channel


Furthermore, Florian is checking the browser version used by the tester. Depending on that we may have to look into the layout issue of the settings footer.
The tester is using: IE9 (Screenshot)

From backend side there should be no need to change something.


You can use the following:

<sec:authorize ifAnyGranted="ROLE_EPROCUREMENTGROUP">
 ....
</sec:authorize>


see: checkout-title.jsp
OCI Login https://test.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=webmaster@distrelec.com&password=123456&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0
Disabled Country, Currency, Channel for OCI Customers in the Shopsettings Lightbox.

Hi Nando

The layout in the SAP Webview is not Internet Explorer 9. Maybe it is IE9 with Compability View or IE9 in IE7 Mode.

As we do not support those, can the underlying browser be configured within the SAP Webview?

Florian,
please see the comment of Dominic regarding the browsers.
Other than that, this issue is resolved.
I'll check it again with the customer tomorrow.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2905] IE8 Fehler: CarouFredSel when only one image
item.description:
Detailpage, IE8, only one Images. IE8 can't initialize the carousel and throws an error.

Module Carousel Teaser.
item.summary: IE8 Fehler: CarouFredSel when only one image

comments.comment: Was an issue with Modernizr.load which was missing in the Skin

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2871] IE: Rotating Hero Teaser arrows alignment
item.description: Arrows in the bottom section of the rotating hero teaser for switching to the previous/next slide are not aligned correctly (centered) - see screenshot
item.summary: IE: Rotating Hero Teaser arrows alignment

comments.comment: This seems already be reolved. I tested in Firefox, Chrome , IE8 and IE9. If error still persist, please define the Browser you are using, thanks!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2862] Search field: "Keyword" and "Supplier" need to be translated to German
item.description: Search field: "Keyword" and "Supplier" need to be translated to German
item.summary: Search field: "Keyword" and "Supplier" need to be translated to German

comments.comment:
Please send us a URL or a print screen.
Thanks

URL: any page, in the search field of the header.

The main issue seems to have been resolved: in German (AT and CH) the search field now reads "Suche Artikel-ID Stichwort Lieferant" instead of "Suche Artikel-ID Keyword Supplier".


However:
- "Artikel-ID" is elsewhere throughout the shop called "Artikelnummer" or "Art.Nr." (e.g. on the detail page, the cart, search result pages). Suggest renaming it in the search field too.
- "Lieferant" is elsewhere in the shop called "Hersteller". Would also suggest to use the same term throughout.

Furthermore (lower prio):
- The English thext for the search field (only relevant for CH, see screenshot) still reads the mix "Suche Artikel-ID Keyword Supplier" (see e.g. here: http://test.distrelec.ch/en/Geh%C3%A4use-Inpac-2-HE-84-TE-Schroff-10828-073/p/11015175)
O changed all the keywords for Art.Nr.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2856] When adjusting the price filter the words "price limit" are in english
item.summary: When adjusting the price filter the words "price limit" are in english

comments.comment: no found. maybe in the pim.

That's something we can change in FF. It will be fixed with the next deployment. We can not change the label before, because than the facet will not work anymore.
so with the next deployment this should be fixed, because than we can differ between field name and label name.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2834] Link to Brother supplier website points to a CH website
item.description:
distrelec.at
Brother supplier does not point to an AT or European website.
see screenshot
item.summary: Link to Brother supplier website points to a CH website

comments.comment: PIM issue - we receive the link like this.
E-Mail was done to the MDM team. This shouldn't be a ticket.
Is the correct URL being displayed? See printscreen from PIM, this is the support URL, shouldn't the manufacturer URL be there?

I believe it's correct:
- the manufacturer logo should link to the manufacturer URL
- the informational URL next to it (label "Website") should be the support URL

Florian, do you agree?

Verified with florian: it is as designed.
Resolving this ticket.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2784] Newsletter page - a few correction on language
item.description: please see the print screen
item.summary: Newsletter page - a few correction on language

comments.comment: from Holger Opitz

Field 5 should be: "In welcher Branche sind Sie tätig?" (capital S on Sie)
Field 6 should be: "Welche Produktkategorien interessieren Sie?"
As per Adi, values of code list are defined here: /distrelecB2Binitialdata/resources/distrelecB2Binitialdata/import/project/common/newsletter.impex
I could not find the values of the drop down

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2734] Checkout Process: If "Pick-up" is selected, (empty) delivery address should not be showing on order review page and cnnformation email
item.description:
Based on DISTRELEC-2672

currently,
if the user selects in-store pick up instead of a shipping address, the empty slot for the display of the shipping address is still showing on the order review page, and in the order confirmation email (and the PDF?).

this should be changed,
so that the shipping address slot is not shown if in-store pickup was selected.
item.summary: Checkout Process: If "Pick-up" is selected, (empty) delivery address should not be showing on order review page and cnnformation email

comments.comment:
Florian,
conceptually, do you agree with the change?
Yes I agree.

Suggest prioritizing this for phase 2, from a functional point of view there is no error, it's only a display issue.

(however the issue with the missing invoice address should be solved before go-live, that's covered here: https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-2672)

Florian, do you agree?

I agree.
Please fix it for phase 2.

Hi Lukas,

can you please take care of this change request. If you need help please ask Dishan for support.

Can you please give me an estimation to implement this change as well.

Thank you.
added pickup location to order confirmation email and pdf. raphael is checking how we can get the pickup location on order history page.

The displaying of the pickup for the order history and the approval workflow is already fixed for AT. The PDF and Email is fixed for CH/IT. But that does not matter as we do not have any pickup locations for AT. But we have to check the functionality at all for CH/IT.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2699] Cross-Testing: Request password does not work
item.description:
The function to request the password doesn't work. If you send a request (after you have entred your email address)then a confirmation notification appears but no e-mail will be send. see screenshot.

IE8
Win7
User: oender.tasdemir@distrelec.com and hannelore.winter@distrelec.com
item.summary: Cross-Testing: Request password does not work

comments.comment:
It works with my account: rene.haemmerli@namics.com.

Did you check the spam folder?
Hi René, I checked as well the spam folder. - and have tried it agian. But it still not work.
Please check reliability of smtp server with Önder.

Hello Önder

I couldn't reach you, so I'm doing it via jira.

The Hybris servers are sending the mails directly to you exchange server (198.18.0.10).
I can say, that sending password recovery mails in general works.

Can you please check with the administrator of the exchange server why you don't receive this mails.

If you have any questions or if you see something how I could help you with this, please call me.

René

es scheint, als sei mein account gelöscht worden. ich habe nochmals mein account erstellt und nochmals versucht. - es funktioniert jetzt. ich werde es noch mit Hannelore Winter versuchen (morgen) und ggf. diesen Ticket schliessen. Bitte informieren, wenn accounts gelöscht werden.
okey, das selbe bei Hannelore Winter. - Die accounts wurden anscheinend gelöscht. - dieses issue können wir schliessen.

attachment.name: notifaction appears but no e-mail will send.jpg
attachment.author: otasdemir

item.title: [DISTRELEC-1889] Concept for Media in CMS
item.description: Concept for Media in CMS. Naming, Structure etc.
item.summary: Concept for Media in CMS

comments.comment: Still an issue?
it's a task for 2014, when we know how the content is structured in special campaigns
We should know now. Can you please check again?
Matthias: Any inputs or specifications from the cms training?!

Oana,

so that not all media end up in the root folder, a guideline regarding naming and structure should be defined by the responsible cms / marketing team of Distrelec.

The media can also be moved later on, but this is a somewhat cumbersome task, so it would be helpful for the team if those guidelines were defined before the content creation in prod starts.

If I'm not mistaken, Stefanie offered to do this a few weeks ago. Could you please coordinate with her and the team?

Thanks
please find attached the concept.

Oana,

hybris does not allow nested folders for multimedia files, I'm afraid.

What you could do instead of creating nested folders such as EB/OM/Merchandizing is creating a single folder named "EB_OM_Merchanidizing".

Please note that folders are treated globally, i.e. if you create such a folder, it will be visible for authors in all countries.
please go on with the proposal above: EB_OM_Merchanidizing. Please do this asap.
Folders have been created according to attached concept (see screenshot).
